price: او څوک چې ښه كارونه وكړي او دى مومن وي نو بيا به نه له ظلمه وېرېږي او نه له تاوانه.
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَلَا يَخَافُ ظُلۡمٗا وَلَا هَضۡمٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿmal mina al-ṣāliḥāti wahuwa mu'minun falā yakhāfu ẓul'man walā haḍman
